userSettings.name: openaikey
userSettings.label: OpenAI API Key (Required)
userSettings.description: Required to generate images using gpt-image-1. Get your API key from https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys

userSettings.name: size
userSettings.label: Size
userSettings.description: Optional. The size of the generated images. Defaults to auto.

userSettings.name: quality
userSettings.label: Quality
userSettings.description: Optional. The quality of the image. Defaults to auto.

userSettings.name: n
userSettings.label: Number of Images (n)
userSettings.description: Optional. Number of images to generate (1-10). Defaults to 1.

userSettings.name: background
userSettings.label: Background
userSettings.description: Optional. Set transparency for the background. Defaults to auto.

openaiSpec.name: image_generation_via_gptimage_1

prompt.description: A detailed text description of the desired image(s) to be generated by gpt-image-1. Maximum length 32000 characters.

openaiSpec.description: Generates images using OpenAI's gpt-image-1 model based on a detailed text prompt. Uses low content moderation settings. Specify the desired image content clearly.
